detailed_profile.about: A dynamic professional managing leadership roles with almost two decades of experience in operation, P&L management, asset operations, strategy planning, business development, customer service. In depth knowledge of banking, microfinance and asset operations Expertise in growing nascent operations to a credible position gaining meritorious recognition and spearheading new projects successfully Proficient in setting up business operation and position organization for long-term profitability. Expert in forging strategic relationships with comprehensive exposure to general administration, budget development/ implementation, market research, HR Functions, framing policies, training & Development, and Hiring & Retention of high caliber Adept in formulating business strategies for augmenting profitability and effectuating market entry strategies relevant for enhancing business growth. Demonstrated ability in client servicing, key accounts management, initiating and developing relationships for business development. Ability to nurture superior customer relationships that deliver significant sales growth. Strong orientation to provide value to customers and satisfaction to partners Efficient Team Leader & Player possessing demonstrable leadership capabilities in managing complex business challenges, mentoring & driving results through active engagement of employees in line with organization's vision and goals. Adaptable to work in new locations both in international & domestic markets

detailed_profile.about: IT professional with over 18+ years of valuable experience in leading IT operations, implementing IT Infrastructure/ Data Center Projects and providing IT Services in a complex software development as well as high demand corporate environment • Capability to lead and set-up IT Infrastructure in an organization to help create value in the growth of the business by making optimum use of cutting-edge technology; exhibited skills in planning and executing projects • Focused on managing IT Infrastructure Operations involving setting-up expanding Data Center Infrastructure (Servers, Network, Storage, Backup, Databases), Migrations, Consolidations and Optimization • Extensive experience in administering and implementing Microsoft Windows Server Infrastructure including Exchange Server, Active Directory on and in Premise, VMware Virtualization and cloud technology like AWS and Azure • Knowledge of Virtual environment on VMware & Hyper-V and server hosting on Private/Public/Hybrid Cloud, Systems Administration including server patching and backup/restore • Expertise in executing projects for Server Consolidations, performing Transitions / Migration from current to future business operations; transforming necessary processes, tools and environment from “present” to agreed “future” state o Successfully managed migration projects for clients globally across India, South Africa, Japan, Switzerland and Dubai • Resourceful in developing Business Continuity Plans & Disaster Recovery Solutions to ensure that business operations are not affected by the occurrence of a disaster or in an emergency situation; • Exhibited leadership in managing teams and ensuring compliance with quality & timelines specified; possess excellent communication, time-management and analytical skills

experience.description_html:
 Responsible for mitigating risk/frauds in SME, HL, LAP & CV portfolios across Pan India Locations.
 Analysis of negative /fraud trends in different product portfolios and working in close associations with other functions like credit / sales / collections & operations, to provide valuable feedback / support in implementation of policy changes.
 Manage operational risks associated with different functions and review strict adherence to policy standards.
 Supervising & Monitoring documents & profile verifications through agencies in given TAT, both for vendors and customers for various products.
 Planning & implementation of strategies to achieve group targets by containing fraud & risk in Mortgages & CV Loan segments.
 Regular audits / investigations of yards, repo assets & processes, to minimize risk associated with asset frauds.
 Instrumental in the design and development of the Quality Assessment processes.
 Independently managing the budgeting of Fraud Control Unit department.
 Recruitment, Training & Supervision of team of FCU Managers & Officers.
 Successfully identified major frauds through close monitoring of processes & documents in Mortgages & CV function
 Diligently conducted investigations of frauds to identify the root causes and avoid its future occurrence.
 Additional responsibility for vetting of any sales/credit policies for fraud risk & suggesting appropriate controls.

detailed_profile.name: Vishwas J Shetty
detailed_profile.position: EVP & National Head @ Sammaan Capital Limited (formerly known as Indiabulls Housing Finance) | Corporate Real Estate Loans
detailed_profile.about: With over 21 years in the banking and NBFC/HFC domain, Sammaan Capital Limited has been instrumental in shaping and executing innovative real estate loan solutions under my leadership. As EVP and National Head, I focus on structuring complex debt instruments such as NCDs, OCDs, and CCDs, facilitating project financing, lease rental discounting, and corporate debt resolutions. Our team specializes in handling large-scale NPA settlements and negotiating mergers and acquisitions for real estate entities, ensuring optimal outcomes for all stakeholders. At the core of my work is a commitment to fostering financial sustainability and growth for clients while driving operational excellence. By enabling large-scale resolutions and spearheading repayment collection strategies, our efforts contribute to the successful execution of high-value real estate projects. My goal remains to create value by combining strategic financial structuring with robust execution capabilities in the corporate real estate space.

Work with various regulatory and statutory bodies for Audit of the Loan Book.

recommendations: Syed Gaous “Daniel Quinn once wrote, “But charisma only wins people’s attention. Once you have their attention, you have to have something to tell them”..And there Vishwas goes, he is not only a charismatic leader but also a great orator and his articulation will compel you to listen to him. As a Manager he is very ethical, strict and at the same time, he is too good at his heart. During my stint to work with him, I came across ample situations where he demonstrated level 5 leadership by balancing task and people like a true leader.The best part of his leadership is, he never shrugs off his responsibility and always stands by his team. I Wish him all the best! ”

Praveen K Nair “Vishwas is an source of inspiration to the team. His positive vibes & charisma could be felt by all those who have been associated with him. He is a rare breed of a thinking professional, with the right mix of strategic vision and action orientation. He radiates knowledge and enriches the lives of people who have the privilege of working with him. He is sharp ,focused and a wonderful human being. He has the uncanny ability to extract the best out of an individual and thereby unlock individual's potential. He believes in leading from the front and always strives to achieve higher standards in all his endeavor's. His phenomenal achievement showed that limitations were only in the mind. His “food for thought” ensured that nothing was truly unattainable for those who dreamed big. He never let preset norms govern his vision, yet he worked round the clock familiarizing himself with every little nitty-gritty that constituted his vision. ”

detailed_profile.position: Dynamic banker with deep expertise in debt capital markets, treasury, relationship management, private equity, SME, retail banking, sales & credit, Known 4 driving growth & strategic alliances, poised 2 lead with vision
detailed_profile.about: Finance professional with 20+ years of expertise in strategic planning, fundraising, and relationship management. Pioneered Asset Light and Co-Lending models, raising over ₹1 lakh crore, including ₹12,000 crore via Co-Lending at Sammaan Capital Limited. Skilled in treasury, debt capital markets, private equity, and compliance with NHB, RBI, and SEBI regulations. Proven leader in deal structuring, business origination, and team management. Holds a Masters in Management Studies (Finance) from Mumbai University. Trustee at St. Peter’s School, Panchgani, and Director at Logos Management Club, Mumbai. Passionate about driving financial innovation and building strategic partnerships.

Drive business origination, financial forecasting, and team leadership to ensure operational excellence and strategic growth.

detailed_profile.about: A result Oriented Professional with nearly 17 years of experience in Team Management, Operations Management,Training & Development and Quality Management. CORE COMPETENCIES Operations Management  Mapping the client’s requirements and coordinating in developing and implementing the processes in line with the pre-set guidelines.  Monitoring the overall functioning of processes, identifying improvement areas and implementing adequate measures to maximise customer satisfaction level.  Maintaining the program dashboard for internal analysis, audits and management presentations. Quality Management  Maintaining & ensuring stringent adherence to quality standards, identifying gaps and opportunities.  Conducting audits and calibration sessions to ensure the quality of the services provided by the company.  Setting out quality standards for various operational areas, ensuring a high-quality customer experience while adhering to the SLAs and work processes. Team Management  Evaluating effectiveness of training & development programs, formulating or reviewing training strategy and determining appropriate instructional methodologies and formats.  Creating and fostering a healthy environment which facilitates high performance of team members and accomplishments of organisational goals.

positions.subtitle: Indiabulls Housing Finance Ltd
positions.description: o Team leader for high value loans credit underwriting o Managing and leading team of credit underwriters including Branch credit managers and Area credit managers o Comprehensive understanding of financial data and detailed analysis of historical & projected financial statements to evaluate company’s performance and Identify the Commercial & Financial risks o Assessing the credit risk involved and presentation of financial data through Excel and Powerpoint for the company management to take actions accordingly o Performing extensive research using available financial data, open source websites to provide details such as industry trends, litigation history, management analysis, SWOT analysis and peer reviews.o Writing detailed credit analysis and appraisal reports and providing recommendations based on the risk profile of the corporateo Analyse and take appropriate decisions basis business meeting, financial evaluation and credit worthiness of prospective and existing clients o Recommendation of high value proposal to committee and independently sanctioning of loan proposals upto 100 lacs after detailed evaluation o Work closely with various teams like sales, collections, audit and operations to constantly improve the credit processeso Monitor the login to disbursement process along with after disbursal service and handling customer relationship of HNI accounts o Structure the right product to the customer during customer interactiono Manage the process required for delivering reasonable turnaround time o High level of autonomy and independent judgment in making decisions and interacting effectively and positively with all levels of customers
positions.title: Regional Credit Head
positions.description_html:
o Team leader for high value loans credit underwriting
o Managing and leading team of credit underwriters including Branch credit managers and Area credit managers
o Comprehensive understanding of financial data and detailed analysis of historical & projected financial statements to evaluate company’s performance and Identify the Commercial & Financial risks
o Assessing the credit risk involved and presentation of financial data through Excel and Powerpoint for the company management to take actions accordingly
o Performing extensive research using available financial data, open source websites to provide details such as industry trends, litigation history, management analysis, SWOT analysis and peer reviews.
o Writing detailed credit analysis and appraisal reports and providing recommendations based on the risk profile of the corporate
o Analyse and take appropriate decisions basis business meeting, financial evaluation and credit worthiness of prospective and existing clients
o Recommendation of high value proposal to committee and independently sanctioning of loan proposals upto 100 lacs after detailed evaluation
o Work closely with various teams like sales, collections, audit and operations to constantly improve the credit processes
o Monitor the login to disbursement process along with after disbursal service and handling customer relationship of HNI accounts
o Structure the right product to the customer during customer interaction
o Manage the process required for delivering reasonable turnaround time
o High level of autonomy and independent judgment in making decisions and interacting effectively and positively with all levels of customers

detailed_profile.about: • Bank & Operations Manager possessing 20 years experience in Banking Operations, Team Management, and Customer Service. • Worked in banking as Branch Operations Manager in ICICI Bank Ltd and in BPO as Operations Team Lead • Worked as a Branch Manager with Barclays Finance. Role as a Branch Manager involved people management, customer service, operations and sales • Working as a Regional Operations Manager with India Bulls Housing Finance Limited • During the initial 3 years of career worked with Marshall Field’s Direct for vCustomer India Pvt. Ltd. • Personality traits include team player, self-motivated and an effective problem solver.

experience.title: Zonal Operations Manager
experience.description: Managed a team of 60 Operations Officer, Senior Officer, Assistant Managers, Area Operations Manager & State Head across Karnataka, Andhra Pradesh, West Bengal & Orissa region.● Managed monthly volumes upto 900 crores.● Handling disbursement of HL & LAP.● Designed processes and process management. Worked towards process improvements to enhance process efficiency.● Conducting training sessions.● Timely inwarding of files & post disbursal documents at central operations.● Ensuring repayment instruments quality & timely PEMI banking, ● Cheque hand over and cheque/cash deposition within TAT.● Ensuring highest level of customer service across all branches.● Ensure compliance of internal service quality standards & ensure customer complaints are handled efficiently.● Working on open updations & open credits● Service request creation & resolution within stipulated TAT.● Initiated continuous process improvement measures to enhance unit’s quality, reduction of errors and productivity.● Adhere to laid compliance guidelines with zero non-compliance cases & audit ratings of the branch.● Identify training & development needs for all employees.AchievementsContributed towards automation of processes.Part of process automation team to identify process improvement opportunities to deliver better TAT and customer experience through improvements in internal application, customer portal and customer interface app.● Designed and implemented performance appraisal mechanism PAN India for Operations team.● Rated 1 in the last 3 performance appraisal cycles.
experience.description_html:
Managed a team of 60 Operations Officer, Senior Officer, Assistant Managers, Area Operations Manager &
State Head across Karnataka, Andhra Pradesh, West Bengal & Orissa region.
● Managed monthly volumes upto 900 crores.
● Handling disbursement of HL & LAP.
● Designed processes and process management. Worked towards process improvements to enhance process
efficiency.
● Conducting training sessions.
● Timely inwarding of files & post disbursal documents at central operations.
● Ensuring repayment instruments quality & timely PEMI banking,
● Cheque hand over and cheque/cash deposition within TAT.
● Ensuring highest level of customer service across all branches.
● Ensure compliance of internal service quality standards & ensure customer complaints are handled
efficiently.
● Working on open updations & open credits
● Service request creation & resolution within stipulated TAT.
● Initiated continuous process improvement measures to enhance unit’s quality, reduction of errors and
productivity.
● Adhere to laid compliance guidelines with zero non-compliance cases & audit ratings of the branch.
● Identify training & development needs for all employees.

Achievements

Contributed towards automation of processes.
Part of process automation team to identify process improvement opportunities to deliver better TAT and
customer experience through improvements in internal application, customer portal and customer interface
app.
● Designed and implemented performance appraisal mechanism PAN India for Operations team.
● Rated 1 in the last 3 performance appraisal cycles.

experience.title: Branch Manager
experience.description: •	Personal discussion with the customers before loan disbursement, verifying KYC documents and ensuring no credit risk•	Accountable for revenue generation & branch profitability•	Ensure disbursement of loans on system sourced by channel.•	Ensuring no discrepancy on disbursement documents and dispatch of documents to central operations within the specific TAT•	Data analysis identifying errors and performing Root Cause Analysis•	Ensure compliance of internal service quality standards & handle customer complaints efficiently.•	Resolve queries of customers and manage customer relationships.•	Disbursement of loans and error control in terms of financial parameters and customer information mitigating operational risk.
experience.description_html:
• Personal discussion with the customers before loan disbursement, verifying KYC documents and ensuring no credit risk
• Accountable for revenue generation & branch profitability
• Ensure disbursement of loans on system sourced by channel.
• Ensuring no discrepancy on disbursement documents and dispatch of documents to central operations within the specific TAT
• Data analysis identifying errors and performing Root Cause Analysis
• Ensure compliance of internal service quality standards & handle customer complaints efficiently.
• Resolve queries of customers and manage customer relationships.
• Disbursement of loans and error control in terms of financial parameters and customer information mitigating operational risk.

experience.title: Branch Operations Manager
experience.description: •	Reported to Regional Operations Manager; led a team of 5 Officers and 10 Executives.•	Oversaw operations of Customer Service Desk, Disbursement Team, Banking & Cash Counter.•	Managed the Customer Service Team for retail loans which serviced walk-in customers often exceeding 3000.•	Managed closure of Service Request within TAT using FCRM software & worked on the FOCUS & Pulse Scores of the branch.•	Managed Banking & Cash Counter Team for retail loans; monthly deposits here exceeded Rs50 million.•	Oversaw cross selling of various products - personal loans, car loans, home loans, insurance etc; measured the overall revenue generated against cost incurred.•	Managed Disbursement of Home Loans & Micro Banking Loans; processed files with volumes typically reaching more than 1500 files per month.•	Ensured disbursement TATs were within 6 hours and implemented Quality & Control measures within the branch.•	Coordinated with Credit Process Assessment Team (CPA Team) for necessary credit documents required for loan disbursement.•	Headed the document processing team tasked with detailed checks of documents received from customers and updated information in the software Finnone.•	Monitored the daily, weekly and monthly productivity and quality reports of the branch and the individual team members for attaining optimum results.•	Analyzed monthly Branch Rating Report received from central operations, and recommended points for improvement. •	Ensured Personal Loan cheques dispatched met the TAT of 24 hours.•	Supported product and process changes rolled-out by Marketing / Process Team / RBI and provided necessary training to all team members.•	Initiated continuous process improvement measures to enhance unit’s productivity.•	Drove initiatives for attaining cost savings.
experience.description_html:
• Reported to Regional Operations Manager; led a team of 5 Officers and 10 Executives.
• Oversaw operations of Customer Service Desk, Disbursement Team, Banking & Cash Counter.
• Managed the Customer Service Team for retail loans which serviced walk-in customers often exceeding 3000.
• Managed closure of Service Request within TAT using FCRM software & worked on the FOCUS & Pulse Scores of the branch.
• Managed Banking & Cash Counter Team for retail loans; monthly deposits here exceeded Rs50 million.
• Oversaw cross selling of various products - personal loans, car loans, home loans, insurance etc; measured the overall revenue generated against cost incurred.
• Managed Disbursement of Home Loans & Micro Banking Loans; processed files with volumes typically reaching more than 1500 files per month.
• Ensured disbursement TATs were within 6 hours and implemented Quality & Control measures within the branch.
• Coordinated with Credit Process Assessment Team (CPA Team) for necessary credit documents required for loan disbursement.
• Headed the document processing team tasked with detailed checks of documents received from customers and updated information in the software Finnone.
• Monitored the daily, weekly and monthly productivity and quality reports of the branch and the individual team members for attaining optimum results.
• Analyzed monthly Branch Rating Report received from central operations, and recommended points for improvement.
• Ensured Personal Loan cheques dispatched met the TAT of 24 hours.
• Supported product and process changes rolled-out by Marketing / Process Team / RBI and provided necessary training to all team members.
• Initiated continuous process improvement measures to enhance unit’s productivity.
• Drove initiatives for attaining cost savings.

experience.title: Operations Team Lead
experience.description: •	Reported to Manager Operations and managed a team of 25 agents.•	Worked in close proximity with the traffic team.•	Analyzed various reports like half hourly reports, AHT, service level and agent performance review•	Attending to weekly client calibration calls•	Fielded supervisory calls.
experience.description_html:
• Reported to Manager Operations and managed a team of 25 agents.
• Worked in close proximity with the traffic team.
• Analyzed various reports like half hourly reports, AHT, service level and agent performance review
• Attending to weekly client calibration calls
• Fielded supervisory calls.

I have a strong knowledge in income assessment, have underwrite multiple cases in various sectors and have a sound knowledge in AIP as well as big tickets. Handling a team and moving together towards greater achievements. I have extended my learning curve in both Technical and legal terms of secured lending. Which supports me to appraise in 3 dimensions. For a brief details, kindly request you to see my resume attached to this profile. Strengths: - Have a sound knowledge in market and activities - Covered core with allied departments - Flexible to work culture - Highly adoptable - Precise to Policy - Enthusiastic towards new learning - Team Handler
